sentences.en: These reforms will abolish racially discriminatory laws.
sentences.cn: 这些改革将废除种族歧视法律。

sentences.en: An Illinois House committee voted Thursday to abolish the death penalty.
sentences.cn: 伊利诺伊州议院的一个委员会在星期四投票废除了死刑。

sentences.en: He took the first step to abolish slavery in America.
sentences.cn: 他迈出了在美国废除奴隶制的第一步。
